turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Can you help me order pizzas from Bella Luna's, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure I can. what do you want to order from bella luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three large pizzas, all three with extra cheese? One pizza can I get ultimate pepperoni or pepperoni with extra pepperoni? Second pizza can I get a meat lovers pizza with extra bacon?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In the third pizza, can I get a Hawaiian pizza with extra ham?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thick crust is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want thick crust for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you saidÂ  you want to order 3 large pizzas, all with extra cheese and thick crust, 1 ultimate pepperoni, 1 meat lovers with extra bacon and 1 Hawaiian pizza with extra ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that down correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your order is $56.44.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you make that for pickup, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order for pick up. it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you so much I appreciate your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care. you're very welcome.
